研究论文

#通讯作者

预印本

Martinez#, "Characterization and Control of the Run-and-Tumble Dynamics of Escherichia Coli ", arXiv:2212.11222 (2022).
    2. Preprint
  2. Yongfeng Zhao*,#, Christina Kurzthaler*,#, Nan Zhou, Jana Schwarz-Linek, Clemence Devailly, Jochen Arlt, Jian-Dong Huang, Wilson C. K. Poon, Thomas Franosch, Vincent A. Martinez#, Julien Tailleur#, "Quantitative characterization of run-and-tumble statistics in bulk bacterial suspensions", arXiv:2212.10996 (2022).
    3. Preprint
  3. Alberto Dinelli, Jérémy O'Byrne, Agnese Curatolo, Yongfeng Zhao, Peter Sollich, Julien Tailleur, "Self-organization of bacterial mixtures in the presence of quorum-sensing interactions", arXiv:2203.07757 (2022).
    4. Preprint
  4. Yongfeng Zhao, "Non-interacting spherical active particles under confinement: generalized entropy potential", arXiv:2111.06156 (2021).
    5. Preprint

已发表论文

  1. Zeng Tao Liu, Yan Shi, Yongfeng Zhao, Hugues Chaté#, Xia-qing Shi#, Tian Hui Zhang#, "Subcritical active matter: Activity waves and freestanding vortices", Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. 118 (40) e2104724118 (2021).
    2. Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci.
  2. Siyuan Yang, Mingji Huang, Yongfeng Zhao, Hepeng Zhang#, "Controlling cell motion and microscale flow with polarized light fields", Phys. Rev. Lett. 126, 058001 (2021).
    3. Preprint, Phys. Rev. Lett.
  3. Ruben Zakine*, Yongfeng Zhao*, Miloš Knežević, Adrian Daerr, Yariv Kafri, Julien Tailleur, Frédéric van Wijland, "Surface Tensions between Active Fluids and Solid Interfaces: bare vs dressed", Phys. Rev. Lett. 124, 248003 (2020).
    4. Preprint, Phys. Rev. Lett., Poster Preprint
  4. Agnese I. Curatolo*, Nan Zhou*, Yongfeng Zhao*, Chenli Liu, Adrian Daerr, Julien Tailleur#, Jian-Dong Huang#, "Cooperative pattern formation in multi-component bacterial systems through reciprocal motility regulation", Nat. Phys. 16, 1152–1157 (2020).
    5. Preprint, Nat. Phys.
  5. Eric Woillez, Yongfeng Zhao, Yariv Kafri, Vivien Lecomte, Julien Tailleur, “Activated escape of a self-propelled particle from a metastable state”, Phys. Rev. Lett. 122, 258001 (2019).
    6. Preprint, Phys. Rev. Lett.
  6. Thibault Bertrand#, Yongfeng Zhao, Olivier Bénichou, Julien Tailleur, Raphaël Voituriez#, “Optimized Diffusion of Run-and-Tumble Particles in Crowded Environments”, Phys. Rev. Lett. 120, 198103 (2018).
    7. Preprint, Phys. Rev. Lett.

    2. Preprint
